- **Gene Symbol:** <u>AHP3, ATHP2</u>
- **Gene Name:** histidine-containing phosphotransmitter 3, ARABIDOPSIS THALIANA HISTIDINE-CONTAINING PHOSPHOTRANSMITTER 2
